Name: Nupursingh
Title: Lots of medicinal plants
Review: If you fan to see medicinal plant then this is right place to chill out. Many informative things can be seen here.

Name: TravelbuggIndia
Title: Botanical Gardens
Review: Botanical Gardens is situated in Charbagh and is a nice place to visit with your family on a weekend.

Name: RAJENDRA884 PRASAD
Title: Best place in Lucknow for morning walks
Review: I am a health enthusiast and always try to find the best place for my morning walks and workouts. While in Lucknow, this is the best place for this.  You will find lots of people, from almost all age groups, who visit these gardens for fresh breath.

Name: AAA
Title: Good Garden for Morning Walk
Review: Botanical Gardens is quite green on all sides. There are many tree plants here. This is great place for stroll, many people come here to get fresh.

Name: P N M
Title: Excellent
Review: Excellent place for Greenery in Lucknow. So many hundred people daily have early morning walk. You can find there variety of rare costly plants. This place is called N B R I Institution

Name: 268yusufn
Title: GOOD PLACE FOR  HOOKAH LOVERS
Review: i visit is place at early morning for morning walk. the crowd in morning is really good. many people come for walking , exercise, meditation,jogging , yoga its huge place.

Name: sujatapant
Title: GREAT place to walk
Review: please be advised this is open to the public only in the morning for walking ,exercise,yoga,and meditation.it is a lovely place ,with several beautiful trees,flowers ,cacti,bonsai plants ,peacocks,birds aplenty.there are water bodies toothis is a botanical research institute run by the govt.

Name: PawanTMMNainital
Title: Botanic Garden, Rana Pratap Marg, Lucknow
Review: Its a very nice place to visit specially Morning Walks, Nature Lovers, Huge space. favourit place Walkers and joggers. really its a nice and pleasant place. maintained by UP Govt. Hats Offbig ground inside. people do Yoga there - lots of fun by locals - they actually rejuvenate themselves.

Name: raks125
Title: ok type
Review: i visited the place for 2 hours. this is one time visit only as there is nothing to see much. it needed maintenance.

Name: pensioner090
Title: Outstanding research institute with lovely gardens open to public
Review: We found the Botanical Gardens by accident. They are not on any tour routes. They are open only from 6.30 - 9.00 am each morning and are well worth the visit if you like gardens and if you want to see real residents of Lucknow out for their  morning exercise...power walking, jogging and just enjoying the gardens. It was a splendid way to begin our day and the gardens are lovely.This is a research institute, not a public garden so they are not open during the hours when scientists are working in the gardens and premises.The gardens are only a 10 minute easy walk down a straight road from the end of Shahnajaf Road where it intersects with Rana Pratap Marg. The lovely Shah Najaf Imambara complex is located at this intersection. When you finish walking around the gardens, walk up the road to the Shah Najaf Imambara and spend a delightful hour there.
